items.title: Top Stock Reports for Amazon.com, Walmart & Cisco Systems
items.description: Zacks spotlights AMZN, WMT and CSCO, each navigating growth and headwinds as AI, tariffs and recurring revenue reshape outlooks.

items.title: Amazon wants to become a global marketplace for AI
items.description: As the global AI race heats up, Amazon Web Services doubles down on its bet that every model should get a seat at the table.

items.title: Amazon, Cameco, Universal Health Services: Trending Tickers
items.description: Amazon (AMZN) is investing $20 billion in Pennsylvania data centers as Big Tech companies work to expand artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure. Cameco (CCJ) stock surges after Westinghouse Electric Corporation, a company of which Cameco owns a significant portion, increased its EBITDA outlook for the next year and signed a nuclear deal. Universal Health Services (UHS) stock is falling after the company's CFO, Steve Filton, said that patients are spending longer in the hospital than they did pre-COVID. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

items.title: Whole Foods Distributor United Natural Foods Stock Dives on Cyberattack News
items.description: Shares of United Natural Foods sank Monday after the company said its business operations were disrupted by "unauthorized activity" on its IT systems.
